## bscli card comment

add a comment for an existing card

### Synopsis

add a comment for an existing card
	

```
bscli card comment [flags]
```

### Examples

```
bscli card comment --card "09lfdk" -s "This is a comment\n this is a new line" 
	
```

### Options

```
      --card string      card identifier
  -c, --comment string   card comment
```
